pr_title: Add Glue UDB to Catalog Service

timeline.bodyText: This class seems identical/ very similar to HiveLayout? can we refactor?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: There is no difference for the current version, should we just use the hive layout instead?
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: could you make this log message specific to glue?  error messages are ideally unique in each class
timeline.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText:
does the default provider chain fail all the time? because it has no credentials?
or does it use the user credentials who launched the machine to determine>?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: The default provider chain fails all the time since they are null.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: can this method be merged with the mounting method in the hive UDB implementation? they should not be that different right?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: I agree. The redundant code is also my concern, I will refactor it. It may a good idea to put these methods into udbUtil instead.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: similarly , can this be refactored?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: Wasn't this already moved to a Utils class?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Since mountAlluxioPaths required dependency on hive and glue, which is a different method for hive udb and glue udb, I move mountAlluxioPath to Utils class, and keep mountAlluxioPaths in hive udb and glue udb.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: one thing i noticed when doing the Hive version of this, is that the client sometimes does not handle disconnection well. Have you tested the case where the connection is not always stable?
timeline.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText: what is the difference between this class and the HiveTable class? can we refactor to reduce duplicated code?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: The Glue Table uses glue dependencies, which should not depend on the Hive Table.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: I think udbProperty should just be property
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: "udb property" should just be "property"
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: I think we typically name these types of class with "Utils". So, it should be UdbUtils
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: is it ok if it is an empty string?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Is this log message necessary? Should it be debug level?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: instead of taking the glue map, can we instead add all those parameters into glueParameters?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: This needs a space after "database" and  space before the e.getMessage(). Also, can we add the catalog id to the message?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: which test uses this?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: can you also add catalog id and database name into the message?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: The mountAlluxioPath is already moved to UdbUtils. I can add the catalog id and database name into the message.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

replies.bodyText: Can you add the db name and catalog id?
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: is this necessary?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: For this exception and others in this method, can you add catalog id and database name?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I don't see the updated exception messages which include the db name and catalog id.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: You can remove "WARNING", and also add the catalog id and the database name.
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: why is this necessary?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: can we just create a local map to pass into UdbConfiguration(conf) on the next line?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: instead of ignoring each method, can you ignore the entire class?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: For all of these conversions, does it handle when fields don't exist or are null? We have hit several issues with the hive one because of these scenarios.
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I have fixed some of the null filed issues in glueUtils, I will add more UT for these scenarios.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: Did you figure out if this is required or not?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Is this required? Or, how can this work without specifying the catalog id?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I don't see the TODO comment?
replies.author: gpang

timeline.message: Remove redudant mountAlluxioPath in HiveDatabase, Implement makePartName for Glue
Fix log, style and pom files
Fix log, style and pom files

timeline.bodyText: what are register and unregister for?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: The register is used to build a new property, and there's no use for unregister for now.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.bodyText: can we get rid of this static map, and just use a local one when needed?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText:
The property is needed since glue need some extra properties compare to default udb.
I will change it to local map.
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.message: Fix log; Fix parameter null point in databaseinfo
